## DeviceNotPresentError class

Thrown when a hardware device (e.g. YubiKey or smart card) required for authentication is not currently connected.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class DeviceNotPresentError extends VaultError 
```
**Extends:** [VaultError](./vaultkeeper.vaulterror.md)
